attributes.action: fulfill the promise to the British people, given by all political parties before the last General Election, to hold a referendum on the Treaty of Berlin
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is not just about the right to be consulted whenever there is a transfer of sovereignty from this country, or indeed any major change in our constitution, but fundamentally it is about integrity in politics. A promise was made to the British public and it is now time for it to be honoured. Failure to do so would establish that our political system is nothing but a tissue of lies.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
